name: Periodic Space
description:
This is a fun educational typing game that involves elements from the periodic table. Why memorize the elements with books or online classes if you can just have fun, train your typing skills and become a master at the periodic table. Learning something can´t be done if you hate learning it, and there's no better way to study something while literally playing an awesome and challenging game. Hope you have a fun and productive experience!

Credits:

Main Developer: Ferplay
Translator Assistant: PliniOP
